scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is a photocopy of a memoir by Otho Scott Lee of his first year of service in the American Civil War 1861-1862, with the First Virginia Cavalry, under the command of General J.E.B. Stuart.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: The orginal manuscript belongs to Robert B. Lee, Otho Scott Lee's son.
